snippet: Few other issues present a starker difference between the two tickets, with President Obama seeking a big expansion and the Republicans pushing big cuts.
abstract: Outcome of the 2012 election will probably have a more immediate and profound effect on Medicaid, despite both campaigns' insistence on framing the election as a debate about the future of Medicare.
lead_paragraph: Few other issues present a starker difference between the two tickets, with President Obama seeking a big expansion and the Republicans pushing big cuts.

headline.seo: Campaigns Have Sharply Different Visions for Medicaid
headline.main: 2 Campaigns Differ Sharply on Medicaid, Seeking Vast Growth or Vast Cuts
headline.print_headline: 2 Campaigns Differ Sharply on Medicaid, Seeking Vast Growth or Vast Cuts
